# X Video Hook Generator Project

This is a full-stack application that analyzes X (Twitter) videos and generates social media/marketing hooks using OpenAI.

## Tech Stack
- Backend: Python FastAPI
- Frontend: React
- APIs: X API, OpenAI (Whisper, GPT-4 with Structured Outputs)

## Project Structure
- `/backend` - Python FastAPI server
- `/frontend` - React application
